name: Humanphobia - Tesis
description:
Humanphobia, also referred as Phantom Tesis, is a game developed in Unreal Engine 4. 

It's a singleplayer-multiplayer experience about a ghost (or some ghosts) trying to scare the members of a family, in order to recover their home. To acomplish this, the player must discover the family members' phobias and use them to scare them.

Currently, our game doesn't has a phobia filter. So if you have any of these phobias, we strongly advise against you playing this game:  

  1. Aracnophobia 
  2. Arsonphobia 
  3. Siderodromophobia 
  4. Masklofobia 
  5. Anatidaephobia (this is a joke! but still...)
  6. Aquaphobia
